display_name: Hypopnea Index: (hypopneas with > 30% flow reduction and with no oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal) / hour of sleep
description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events.
calculation: 60 * (hrembp + hrop + hnrbp + hnrop + urbp + urop + unrbp + unrop) / slptimetotal
